nodes.text: Bulo was a male Duros quartermaster of the Ravagers pirate gang on Rishi during the Galactic War. In 3637 BBY he was attacked in Coratanni Town by a group hired by the former Ravagers Captain Ruugar. Bulo put up a fight, but was eventually overwhelmed and killed.
Quartermaster Bulo appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
